summary: THE CONSUMER RECEIVED RECALL NOTICE #02V053000  CONCERNING INADVERTENT VEHICLE MOVEMENT.  THE CONSUMER MADE AN APPOINTMENT WITH MOTHER LODE MOTORS ON 5/30/2003.
